name: Fragments (itch) (jirid0)
description:
Fragments is a game where you are a God stuck inside your own head. You want to declutter your brain by breaking objects and recollect your memories by collecting fragments. 

Controls:

WASD to move

E to punch

I to open inventory

W + Space to wall climb 

Questions: 

  1. What are things that you wished you could do/wanted to do but couldn't or was unable to? 
  2. What would you add to the game to make it more fun or interactive?
  3.  Do you feel that there were enough elements to the game that keeps it interesting? 
  4. Was the camera working fine for you? Is the sensitivity too low or too high?
  5. Is there anything in the playtest that made you frustrated?
  6. What would you add if you were working on this game?

Notes: We are still working on adding enemies and a combat system, we wanted to add it to this playtest but decided it is not complete enough to add. On top of that, we plan to add more things to make the levels more interactive in general and the game run smoother.
